lines.text: I have builded 6 panels of leds and a big bus of 24 cables to control all leds, I chosen to use a transistor and an external power supply to light all of them, and also a shift register to control them.
lines.text_raw: I have builded 6 panels of leds and a big bus of 24 cables to control all leds, I chosen to use a transistor and an external power supply to light all of them, and also a shift register to control them.

lines.text: Each panel have a "home made connector" to make the installation easier and comfortable to carry.
lines.text_raw: Each panel have a "home made connector" to make the installation easier and comfortable to carry.

lines.text: I have connected 2 pressure mats on my Arduino that have two pins to make it work, one ground input and the output to detect you have triggered it.
